forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: better script rotation

comments.text: idk if anyone actually reads theese things, but it would be wonderful if we could have axis specific rotation/pointing
e.g. (when starts then all parts face-x nearest {thing}) to have a part point at something else in only one axis

thread.latestCommentText: e.g. (when starts then all parts face-x nearest [thing]) to have a thing point at another only in a single axis
